template.name: Taxjar Connector - Simplify Your eCommerce Sales Tax Management

div.p: Automate sales tax calculation with taxjar Odoo integration.

img.title: Taxjar Connector - Simplify Your eCommerce Sales Tax Management

div.p: Taxjar is a cloud-based automation tool for managing sales tax in states where you have nexus. If you use Odoo ERP and have nexus in some states, you may find it difficult to manage sales tax. Our application can help you integrate Taxjar with Odoo ERP, simplifying your sales tax calculations.

header.p: Get ready to experience a game-changing transformation with our sizzling hot features that will take your product experience to the next level.

div.h5: Auto Tax Added In Sale Order

div.h5: Auto Tax Applied In Sale Quotation
